about_the_game:
A Roguelike Deckbuilder where you fight your biggest nightmares.
Find the way trough the doors of your mind and beat the nightmares for good.

Select cards, build your deck and level up your cards to be strong enough to beat your biggest fears.


Plan your moves strategically and use the weakness of your enemy.

Features

  • Roughlite: Find your way through a random generated world. Choose the right door to find a shop, camp, reward or your next enemys. Use your coins to buy upgrade for your next run, to come back stronger.
  • Combin deckbuilding with autobattler: Collect up to 6 cards, place them strategically against up to 4 enemys and let them fight.
  • Level and upgrade your cards by using them and combine them with the effect of up to 3 items, that you can win or find in the world.

name: Dreamworld Dread
short_description: Your nightmares relentlessly return every time you close your eyes. Learn new skills, level them up, and never lose them, or else succumb to the darkness in this thrilling roguelite deckbuilder.
